name: HumanAI
description: AI for the Arts and the Humanities

projects.summary: HumanAI is dedicated to integrating Artificial Intelligence with various fields in the Arts and Humanities.

jina_response:
Title: HumanAI

URL Source: https://humanai.foundation/

Markdown Content:
* * *

![Image 1: HumanAI Logo](https://humanai.foundation/images/humanai.jpg)

HumanAI is dedicated to integrating Artificial Intelligence with various fields in the Arts and Humanities. Our mission is to enhance the analytical potential of Arts and Humanities by combining humanist interests with machine learning initiatives.

* * *

HumanAI in GSoC 2025
--------------------

The HumanAI open source umbrella organization plans to participate in the [2025 Google Summer of Code](https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/). If you are a student interested in our [projects](https://humanai.foundation/activities/gsoc2025.html) please check our [ideas page](https://humanai.foundation/gsoc/2025/summary.html). HumanAI is an umbrella organization that welcomes other projects and organizations related to machine-learning in Arts and Humanities. Please contact the admins at [human-ai@cern.ch](mailto:human-ai@cern.ch) if you are interested in participating as a project.

![Image 2: GSoC-logo](https://humanai.foundation/images/GSoC/GSoC-icon-192.png)

Please take a look at our [GSoC Page](https://humanai.foundation/activities/gsoc2025.html) for more details.

You can also find us on [Gitter](https://matrix.to/#/#humanai-foundation:gitter.im).

**Latest update: evaluation tests to be published on 2/27.**

Organization administrators:  
[Prof. Sergei Gleyzer, AI](http://sergeigleyzer.com/)  
[Prof. Xabier Granja, Modern Languages](https://xgranja.people.ua.edu/)  
[Prof. Emanuele Usai, AI](https://emanueleusai.com/)  
[Prof. Despina Stavrinos, Social Sciences, Psychology](https://psychology.ua.edu/people/despina-stavrinosa/)
